Pantheios - Project Map - examples

The example programs are contained in the sub-directories of this directory.

The examples are divided into C and C++, in the subdirectories c and cpp.

All example files are compiled and linked, ready for execution, as part of the build process (see ../build/readme.html).

All example files are built into the auto-generated documentation, and their contents are best viewed in that form, where the Pantheios library components that they make use of may be browsed directly.
